content: ears finishing see pictures below for more details sew the mouth patch and head patch when i did the head patch i did not sew it 1 down around the top until later on when i sewed the front to the back with the head patch and the mouth patch sewn on i finished up the face using 2 2 sew-on google eyes you could also embroider the eyes on if you don t like the look of the google eyes set your tape measurer into your bottom piece with the tape coming out of the opening / slit we left open and with the button you push to pull the tape back inside facing down place your face piece on top so the tape comes out where one of the 3 monkey s ear will sit the ears should be in level with the mouth on the side of his head sew the face piece to the bottom piece keeping the tape measurer inside both pieces attach one ear to the end of the tape measurer that is sticking out the slit on the side by sticking it into the opening use the tail that was left from the ear and run it 4 through the stitches around the opening and tighten it a bit attach the other ear on the opposite side by sewing it on page 4 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together these are all the pieces laying out in the 2nd pic i sat the tape measurer inside the bottom / sides so you could see how the tape comes out of the slit in the side in the 3rd pic i have set the mouth and head patches where i want them to go when i sew them on here i have sewn the two patches on you can see how i shaped the head patch to match the shape of the 4th round this is a shot of the google eyes with the sewing loop on the back so you can attach it with thread or yearn the pic on the right has the eyes sewn onto the face page 5 of 7 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com on the left i ve set the face down on the bottom for sizing i started sewing the face on with the tail i left i positioned the tail where the edge of the slit is next to the tape measurer if your tail is not in that same position don t worry you have 30 stitches on the top / face piece and on the bottom / sides piece so no matter where you start stitching it s still going to fit perfectly remember you have 30 stitches on both pieces you can see how i m lining each stitch up to get a perfect closure
